room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Magician's Study" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: Loads of fun! We went as a work group and it really encourages teamwork.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Magician's Study" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: My team from work headed here for an outing together, and we had a great time. The Magician's Study was super fun and I can't say enough good things about the booking process, the staff, and the experience. Thank you for a wonderful time!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery of the Magician's Study" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: Did the Magician's Study, and would highly recommend! I enjoyed the technology and automation entwined in the room, and well as the stats sheet at the end for my team compared with the typical and best team. Math majors like their data ;p
